Sql.query:
insert into si_log( logcodi, modcodi, logdesc, logfeccreacion, logusucreacion
) values( {0}, {1}, '{2}', sysdate, '{3}' )
update si_log set logdesc = {0}, LOGUSUMODIFICACION = '{4}', LOGFECMODIFICACION = to_date('{5}','dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss a.m.' , 'nls_date_language=american') where logcodi = {1} and modcodi={2}

select * from ( select logcodi, modcodi, logdesc, LOGFECCREACION, LOGUSUCREACION, LOGFECMODIFICACION, LOGUSUMODIFICACION, (row_number() over (order by LOGFECCREACION desc)) as r from si_log where modcodi = {2} and trim(upper(LOGUSUCREACION)) = trim(upper('{0}')) order by LOGFECCREACION desc ) where r >= (1) and r < (11)

select logcodi, modcodi, logdesc, LOGFECCREACION, LOGUSUCREACION, LOGFECMODIFICACION, LOGUSUMODIFICACION from si_log where modcodi = {2} and LOGFECCREACION >= to_date('{1}','dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss a.m.' , 'nls_date_language=american') and LOGFECCREACION < (to_date('{1}','dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss a.m.' , 'nls_date_language=american')+ INTERVAL '1' day) and trim(upper(LOGUSUCREACION)) = trim(upper('{0}')) order by LOGFECMODIFICACION desc

SELECT log.*,lmig.LOGMIGTIPO, q.MIQUBAMENSAJE,MIQUBAFLAG FROM SI_LOG log INNER JOIN SI_LOGMIGRA lmig on lmig.logcodi=log.logcodi left join SI_MIGRAQUERYBASE q on q.MIQUBACODI = lmig.MIQUBACODI WHERE lmig.MIGRACODI = {0} order by log.logcodi asc
insert into si_log( logcodi, modcodi, logdesc, LOGFECCREACION, LOGUSUCREACION ) values( :logcodi, :modcodi, :logdesc, :logfeccreacion, :logusucreacion )

SELECT LOGCODI, LOGDESC, LOGUSUCREACION, LOGFECCREACION FROM SI_LOG L WHERE (LOGDESC = '{0}' or '0' ='{1}') AND ( LOGFECCREACION >= TO_DATE('{2} 00:00:00','DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR {2} IS NULL ) and ( LOGFECCREACION <= TO_DATE('{3} 00:00:00','DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR {3} IS NULL ) and l.modcodi = 1 --Modcodi mantenimientos ORDER BY LOGFECCREACION
